name: I Like Ya Cut G SIMULATOR HD
name_original: I Like Ya Cut G SIMULATOR HD
description:
A couple years ago I made a shitty unfunny clicker game called "I Like Ya Cut G SIMULATOR"

I gave my only copy of the game to an idiot who has 2 brain cells and he couldn't open a fucking .exe file... Then the next day he somehow fucking loses it.

I haven't made anything in Unity in a long time so I decided to remake ILYCG sim but in HD . 

was it worth it?

...

probably not!

but who knows... maybe someone might find it at least a little enjoyable....
